title: Boris Johnson news live: Latest updates today
text:
Boris Johnson is flying back to London this morning following an explosive Supreme Court defeat plunged his his premiership into its deepest crisis yet.

The prime minister made a rambling inaugural address to the UN General Assembly before his early flight home, after his prorogation was ruled unlawful and Speaker John Bercow said parliament would resume.

MPs will return to the Commons at 11.30am this morning. It comes as a poll found that 50 per cent of voters agreed with the judges’ decision, while only 29 per cent disagreed.

We’ll tell you what’s true. You can form your own view. From 15p €0.18 $0.18 USD 0.27 a day, more exclusives, analysis and extras.

Please allow a moment for the live blog to load:
description: Boris Johnson is flying back to London this morning following an explosive Supreme Court defeat plunged his his premiership into its deepest crisis yet. The prime minister made a rambling inaugural address to the UN General Assembly before his early flight home, after his prorogation was ruled unlawful and Speaker John Bercow said parliament would resume.
